abstract: Everyone has her own shopping pattern for Bloomingdale's, the mother ship on Lexington Avenue and 59th Street, but mine turns out to be not so original. I always head to the contemporary brands on the second floor.
snippet: Everyone has her own shopping pattern for Bloomingdale's, the mother ship on Lexington Avenue and 59th Street, but mine turns out to be not so original. I always head to the contemporary brands on the second floor.

headline.main: At Redone Bloomingdale's, Hit the Escalators
